title: Crypt32.dll Crash in main lobby
body:
There apparently was a micro-patch performed today and suddenly my client immediately crashes upon reaching the main lobby. Included is a screen of the offending error message and a pastebin of the resultant crash report.

http://pastebin.com/cGiEkppE

replies.body: It looks the client can't access a specific file, and needs permission.  I believe that this may be the case for the error in your screenshot, and our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide should help get that reconfigured.  Hopefully, that will restore access and prevent further errors like that!
Well that was a shock. Seems your patch occurred when a very important security update for W7 went live. The issue is now fixed thank you man.
